TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AuditLogLocation extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定与安全相关的事件日志的记录位置。

span.span: Specifies the location where security-related event logs are written.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当创建需要调用方身份验证和/或授权的 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 应用程序时，您可以指定记录与安全相关的事件的成功或失败情况，或同时记录两者。When creating a [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] application that requires authentication and/or authorization of callers, you can specify that events related to security be recorded for either success, failure, or both. 日志的位置由此枚举确定。The location of the log is determined by this enumeration. 指定审核日志的级别的方法是：通过将 类的 或 属性设置为 值之一。The level of the audit log is specified by setting the or the property of the class to one of the values. 你还可以指定审核行为使用[ <serviceSecurityAudit> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicesecurityaudit.md)绑定。You can also specify audit behavior using the [<serviceSecurityAudit>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicesecurityaudit.md) binding. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果属性设置为安全和`Audit Object Access`中未设置`Local Security Policy`，审核事件将不会写入安全日志。If the property is set to Security and `Audit Object Access` is not set in the `Local Security Policy`, audit events will not be written to the Security log. 不返回任何失败记录，但审核项也不会写入安全日志。No failure is returned, but audit entries will not be written to the Security log. 此外，调用线程必须确保 `SeAuditPrivilege` 可以写入安全日志。In addition, the calling thread must have `SeAuditPrivilege` to be able to write to the Security log. ## 默认值取决于操作系统Default Dependent on Operating System 将属性设置为默认值，操作系统将确定哪些日志实际将写入。When setting the property to the Default value, the operating system determines which log will actually be written to. 有关详细信息，请参阅[审核](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/auditing-security-events.md)。For more information, see [Auditing](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/auditing-security-events.md). ## Examples 下面的示例将 属性设置为 值之一。The following example sets the property to one of the values. [!code-csharp[AuditingSecurityEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/auditingsecurityevents/cs/auditingsecurityevents.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AuditingSecurityEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/auditingsecurityevents/vb/auditingsecurityevents.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation Application = int32(1)

summary.span: 在事件日志中指定应用程序日志。

span.span: Specifies the Application log in the event log.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation Default = int32(0)

summary.span: 指定由操作系统确定的默认位置。

span.span: Specifies the default location, which is determined by the operating system.

summary.span: 如果支持写入安全日志（例如在 [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[ws2003](~/includes/ws2003-md.md)] 以及更高版本的平台中），则默认日志位置将为安全日志。

span.span: If writing to the Security log is supported (such as on [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[ws2003](~/includes/ws2003-md.md)] and later platforms), the default log location is the Security log.

summary.span: 否则（例如在 [!INCLUDE[wxpsp2](~/includes/wxpsp2-md.md)] 中），默认日志位置将为应用程序日志。

span.span: Otherwise (such as in [!INCLUDE[wxpsp2](~/includes/wxpsp2-md.md)]), the default log location is the Application log.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation Security = int32(2)

summary.span: 在事件日志中指定安全日志。

span.span: Specifies the Security log in the event log.

summary.span: 调用线程必须确保 可以写入安全日志。

span.span: The calling thread must have to be able to write to the Security log.
